  • SecurityHelper interface.

    July Karpey

    • Methods Summary

        Methods 
        Type Name and description
        java.lang.String getUser(java.lang.Object session)
        Returns the username of logged user.
        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getUserGroups(java.lang.Object session)
        Returns the groups list for logged user.
        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getUserRoles(java.lang.Object session)
        Returns the roles list for logged user.
        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getUsers(java.lang.Object session)
        Returns the possible users associated with logged user (e.g. user substitutes another user).
        java.lang.Boolean isControllerAccessible(java.lang.Object session)
        Checks if controller actions are available for calling.

      • java.util.List<java.lang.String> getUsers(java.lang.Object session)

        Returns the possible users associated with logged user (e.g. user substitutes another user). Should be used for determination Authorities of logged user.

        Parameters:
        session
        Returns:

      • java.lang.Boolean isControllerAccessible(java.lang.Object session)

        Returns:
